channel.title: Robots on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in Robots on Let's see what happens.

item.title: Olympics
item.description:
In Russian to cheer for the team can be directly translated into english as “to be ill for”.

I found it amusing when a reporter from Olympics in China said that “We are still being ill here”.

Also between that it is very patriotic to show some soviet technological developments/acheivements that were not pursued after the fall. So that people feel the dark sorrow for the glorious past and resentment toward ideological enemies.
